content:
Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I can use the acacia_wood to craft the acacia_planks, which is a subgoal of the purple_bed. Therefore, I will move the acacia_wood to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I have crafted the acacia_planks, so I will move them to the inventory slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft a purple bed, I need to place three purple wool blocks in the top row of the crafting grid. I have three purple wool blocks at slot 34, so I will start by moving one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Next, I will move another purple wool block to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last purple wool block to slot 3, which is to the right of slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that the top row of the crafting grid is filled with purple wool, I need to fill the bottom row with wood planks. I have birch planks at slot 22, so I will start by moving one to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]

thought: Now that the crafting grid is filled with the correct materials, I can craft the purple bed. The crafted bed will appear in the craft slot (slot 0), so I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 13) to complete the task.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
